::Battera::

She woke up to hear Zardus on her link.  She hadn't realized she had 
even fallen asleep.  She yawned and stretched her wings. She then 
returned on the link,"I'm on vacation. I got insulted, yelled at, 
slapped in the face and pushed around enough for one day. You want me 
back, fine. I'll return. In a few days." She turned off her link. She 
then rewrapped her wings around her body and snuggled down.  Hanging 
upside down on her branch, high up in the trees. She then reached up 
and touched her face, it still hurt where she got slapped. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I agree with Logo. Lets get a bit creative. Like "Son of a 
maintenance bot" 
> or "piece of scrap" or other TF related things. Bitch, fuck, and 
the other 
> human words like that don't fit into a robot war.
> 
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus frowns as he watches Battera fly away, activating his comm.
> 
> "Battera," he says into it, looking back at Rage, "Where are you 
going?"
